title: (2490) Ourém - 667 Rua Principal

title: (2495) Fátima - Parque do Santuário

title: (2495-401) Fátima - 50 Rua de São Vicente de Paulo
title_short: (2495-401) Fátima - 50 Rua de São Vicente de Paulo
description: Fatima Parking available for visits. It is true that the number of "camper" places is limited, but apart from "important events and busy days" it is tolerated to park in the "car" parking lot, obviously taking care not to get in the way. In May 2019 the barriers were therefore open and nothing to pay, we stayed one night. Thanks to Fatima for her welcome. SPECIFIC: There are 14 or 15 parking spaces around the site where there is really space, we were in parking lot number 6

address.street: 50 Rua de São Vicente de Paulo

Parking area, newly planned and stepwise, graveled. 
with some trees and trash bins. 
very quite at night. around 900m to walk to the river bath with toilets, showers and restaurant.
the parking areas near the bath are very crowded in the season. 
(only 2G with NOS)

title: (2495) Leiria - Unnamed Road
description: This is an amazing little picnic parc called “Parque de Merendas da "Fonte de Peixe" - Vale Maior”. We spent 2 nights in the middle of nature, yet with 2 water fountains (one with a thread for hose). A local guy came by and even opened the toilets for us, we are not sure if they are normally open. very quiet nights alone, just nature sounds. there are rubbish containers and when you drive here, there is an asphaltic road (from direction casal dos ferreiros). we came from a different road, but it was very doable with our van, still we recomment coming from the direction mentioned.

title: (2300) Tomar -
description: Nice little spot, isolated under the pines, next to the aqueduct. calm.

title_short: (2495-032) São Mamede - 1 Rua de São Martinho
description: Quiet, peaceful Aire with full services. Overnight is welcome. Many thanks to the small community. The coffee, breakfast and freshly baked hot breads at "Padrio Heleno" were wonderful. The only place to eat in this small village is "Marmita Do Ze Grande-Fatima" which is an "eat all you want buffet"  (good selection of home-cooked foods at an amazing price). Excellent.

Nevertheless and close to the Bombeiros the bar Capitulo allows you to access the wifi with the code "superbock" (without parentheses!)

title_short: (2486) Mira de Aire - 110 Avenida Mota Pinto

title_short: (2440-208) Reguengo do Fetal - 6a Travessa Nossa Senhora do Fetal

title: (2420-093) Caranguejeira - 78 Rua das Industrias
description: Excellent place with drinking water from a source that has existed for many years

name: Quinta da Cavada
title: (2420-138) Quinta da Cavada
description:
Quinta da Cavada.
Somos uma família autocaravanista, amantes da natureza e dos animais, somos vegetarianos e gostamos de tudo o que é biológico e temos uma pequena horta.  Moramos numa aldeia, chamada Souto de Cima que fica nos arredores de Leiria, Portugal, onde temos a nossa casa e um pequeno santuário animal, com cabras, ovelhas, galinhas, patos, etc... também temos cães, Golden Retriever e Pastor Alemão e um gato.
Numa parte do nosso terreno, melhorámos para acolher autocaravanas, temos 4 lugares, onde podem estar á vontade, tem água potável, despejos e chuveiro de água fria. O terreno é todo vedado.
Pagamento livre, para manutenção e melhoramentos do espaço. 
Todos são bem vindos, inclusive animais, só pedimos para respeitarem o espaço, as pessoas e os animais que cá estão.
Temos a 650m minimercado, café e pastelaria.
Na Vila da Caranguejeira que fica a 2.4 kms temos restaurantes, Multibanco, Bancos, lavandaria, talhos, farmácia, cafés, mini mercados, etc...
Para visitar aqui perto temos o Cruzeiro e o Miradouro do Carril que se podem visitar numa pequena rota panoramica com vista para a Vila da Caranguejeira, temos o Vale do Lapedo, O Parque Natural da Barroca da Gafaria, etc...
Estamos a 9.7 kms do centro de Leiria, a 18 kms de Fátima, a 32 kms das praias, a 22 kms do Mosteiro da Batalha, etc...Quinta da Cavada. We are a motorhome family, nature and animal lovers, we are vegetarians and we like everything organic and we have a small vegetable garden. We live in a village called Souto de Cima which is on the outskirts of Leiria, Portugal, where we have our home and a small animal sanctuary, with goats, sheep, chickens, ducks, etc ... we also have dogs, Golden Retriever and German Shepherd it's a cat. In a part of our land, we improved to accommodate motorhomes, we have 4 places, where they can be at ease, have drinking water, dumps and cold shower. The land is all fenced. Free payment, for maintenance and space improvements. Everyone is welcome, including animals, we only ask to respect the space, the people and the animals that are here. We have a 650m mini-market, coffee and pastry. In Vila da Caranguejeira which is 2.4 km away we have restaurants, ATMs, banks, laundry, butchers, pharmacy, cafes, mini markets, etc ... To visit nearby we have the Cruzeiro and the Miradouro do Carril that can be visited on a small panoramic route overlooking the village of Caranguejeira, we have the Vale do Lapedo, the Natural Park of Barroca da Gafaria, etc ... We are 9.7 kms from the center of Leiria, 18 kms from Fátima, 32 kms from the beaches, 22 kms from Batalha Monastery, etc ...

title: (2395-104) Minde - 425 Avenida São Sebastião
description: Gas station with washer and dryer

name: Quinta da Choupana
title: (2300-404) Quinta da Choupana
description:
Educational farm of 2.7 hectares, quiet and peaceful place. 4 km from the Templar city of Tomar, 30 km from the Sanctuary of Fátima, 1h30 from Lisbon and 2 hours from Porto. Near the dam of Castelo de Bode, Penedo Furado em Villa de Rei, dam of the Caril ...
Price for 2 adults and 2 children up to 13 years old. €5 extra per person.
Use of the swimming pool: €2/day/person.
THANKS

title: (2395-104) Minde - 308 Avenida São Sebastião
description: Very close to Intermarché

name: Camping Alvorão
title: (2350) Camping Alvorão
description: Camping Park you need CALL Numbers At placard to open door, safe place near Torres Novas you can go to the city center walking 10 min visit city castle

title: (2485) Mira de Aire - 371 Rua Chão de Empires
title_short: (2485) Mira de Aire - 371 Rua Chão de Empires
description: Very nice place for 2 vans or 1 large camper. It is on the edge of a dirt road. Quiet night and beautiful morning with birdsong and a view of the "Ventas do Diabo". Please keep this site as clean as we did!

title: (2300) Tomar -
description: Beautiful little beach on Lake Carril, a stone's throw from Tomar! If you are looking for a place in nature for the night in order to visit Tomar the next day as I was, this is a great solution! Only downsides: the motorway which is really not far but little frequented at night, and the access which is a little steep on a dirt road should be avoided in rainy weather.

title: (2300) - Estrada Ribeira
description: Chaotic path, much too steep, very difficult to access and a lot of large mosquitoes on site. We did not stay. I do not recommend at all.

title: (2480) Alqueidão da Serra - 297 Rua Porto de Mós
title_short: (2480) Alqueidão da Serra - 297 Rua Porto de Mós
description: Very nice water point with tap on the side of the road. good flow

title: (2350) Torres Novas - 3 Avenida Doutor João Martins de Azevedo
title_short: (2350) Torres Novas - 3 Avenida Doutor João Martins de Azevedo
description: Large parking by the roundabout. Leveled. We didn't stay the night but think it would be possible. Short walk to the city center and castle. Don't try and park close to the castle if your vehicle is longer than 6 meters. The streets are very narrow and there's just not much space to park.

address.street: 3 Avenida Doutor João Martins de Azevedo

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - Unnamed Road
description: Moinho da Cabeça da Vaca it's a magical place with a chilling sunset. It has picnic tables and it is a typical mill in the region where flour was once milled to make bread.

title: (2485) Alvados -
description:
A big parking lot next to the Santo-Antonio cave. 
We spendt one night here. 
Litle traffic on the road, quiet and peaceful.

title: (2350) Torres Novas - 7 Avenida 8 de Julho
description: Nice park to visit city of Torres Novas. Near everthing, including the indoor market. Forbidden to park on Tuesdays because of local market outdoor market at this place. No water or supplies.

title: (2480-034) Alvados - Unnamed Road
description:
Park place next to the Alvados grotto. It is not specific for van but you can park for a quit night and no one will say anything. In the morning you can visit the grotto. 
you have a nice view to the mountains.

title: (2350) Torres Novas - 171 N3
description: Laundromat, right next door about 100m there is a continent good place to take advantage and go shopping

title: (2480) Alcaria - 118 Rua Manuel João Luís Salgueiro Alcaria
title_short: (2480) Alcaria - 118 Rua Manuel João Luís Salgueiro Alcaria
description: Outdoor nature place with picnic area. We spent a very quiet day among the pines. Road nearby . A nice little place for a break.

address.street: 118 Rua Manuel João Luís Salgueiro Alcaria

name: Camping Pelinos
title: () Camping Pelinos
description: Camping Pelinos - Very quiet site, generous locations, high hedges to separate the sites, swimming pool, very nice owners, nature environment. Sanitary flawless, nothing to complain about. service at the top.

title: (2480) Alvados -
description: Ample space to park for the night for multiple RVs/vans. Quiet spot with no homes in sight and an amazing lookout over the valley below. The only building nearby is the ticket office for the Alvado caves.

title: (2480-032) Alvados - 407 Rua Val do Bispo
description: A small place in the village with toilet and shower (cold) and drinking water. Too tight for large CC, only for smaller vehicles

title: (2410) Cortes - 169 N356-2
description:
Self service laundry.
Has changing machine.
Has coffee machine and 2 sofas for waiting.
Please disinfect (alcohol provided in site) your hands and bring mask.

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - 210 Estrada Principal
description: Rest area, located on a mixed parking lot, with greenery, several picnic tables and even a barbecue. 2 km from Porto de Mòs. Facing a small country road, quite quiet. Possibility to spend the day or even the night there. No service. At the start of a beautiful hike (10 km).

title: (2330) Entroncamento - 1 Avenida das Forças Armadas
description: Parking for camper van, safety could spend the night . Near to a green park, ASA - Entroncamento

title: (2440) Batalha - 32 Estrada do Casal Novo
description: Temporary parking area on a serviced open lane for future construction and sale of land. Slightly sloping terrain with hard parking spaces away from the city and close to some villas. the land overlooks the city at the top of the hill near a relay antenna. no service but enough for a good night's visit to the monastery the next day. no vehicle at night, only passage of a neighbor who was walking his dog. the lampposts that equip the area do not work unlike those of the nearby road.

title: (2330) Entroncamento - 65 Rua Gustave Eiffel
description: New urban park with lots of space for parking, low traffic. Great to walk the dog and do some clean up and maintnaince. Nearby to the highway, may be a bit noisy to sleep.

title: (2420) Boa Vista - 42 Rua da Moinhaga
description: Picnic area with playground, BBQ and washing-up facilities on the edge of the village. We spent the night on a weekday and it was very quiet, would not attempt coming here at the weekend as it will be busy with locals and probably no parking available. Small gravel parking area behind the toilet building, enough room for two vans. Toilets were closed when we visited but perhaps would be open usually. The water is only accessible by foot.

title: (2480) Alvados -
description: Picnic park located next to the municipal road to Alvados. Equipped with WC and BBQ area. Everything very clean and taken care of. The bathrooms have electricity with a socket. There is also a small lagoon that is very low, perhaps due to the time of year. Close to hiking trails.

title: (2330) Entroncamento - Rua Diogo Cāo
description: Many truck drivers park here, shopping center E.leclerc

title: (2330) Entroncamento - 89 Avenida das Forças Armadas
description: Nice little swimming pool that we used for a (warm) shower on the way through.

name: Camping Redondo
title: (2300-035) Camping Redondo
description: Camping REDONDO near TOMAR A garden of exceptional rarity warm welcome very clean and functional facilities A garden with various species swimming pool and barbecue

title: (2440) Batalha - 330 Avenida dos Descobrimentos
description: Nice straight parking lot in a very nice city park not far from the monastery. but with WiFi, basketball, toilets and free mini golf, if you have your putter with you.

title: (2440) Batalha - 2 Rua do Moinho da Vila
title_short: (2440) Batalha - 2 Rua do Moinho da Vila
description: Shaded parking two steps from the sites classified very well for a stopover visits or for a nap at the end of afternoon

title: (2440) Batalha - 10 Rua do Infante Dom Fernando
title_short: (2440) Batalha - 10 Rua do Infante Dom Fernando
description: Free parking ideal for the day to visit the monastery which is a 5 minute walk but no places in the shade. Children's playground nearby. Not tested at night.

title: () Leiria - Via Polis Leiria
description: Good Place to stay day and night, very quiet,dog friendly. Near the skate park and river.10 minutes walking to the City center. Very peacefull city.

title: (2440) Batalha - 19 Praceta Infante Dom Pedro
description: Laundromat

name: Quinta das Lameiras
title: (2300) Quinta das Lameiras
description: Hello friends Our humble Biological Farm with an area of ​​3ha. We are 9km from the Templar city of Tomar, 4km from the river beach of Alverangel, 2.5km from the clean water river. Train station 3km away. We can be your Uber. We have a Hostel4campers with enough space for campers, caravans and some tents. Access to private bathroom; Common interior room (40m2 with sofas, swings and area for children to play; free kitchen with large table, free fridge, only washing machine and gas stove are paid ; There is also a outdoor leisure area with swings. Electricity 10amp; Disposal of dirty water and access to drinking water. Fresh homemade bread.. We can have a traditional Portuguese meal. We look forward to welcome you. Don't hesitate to visit our profile on Instagram (quinta_das_lameiras) or FB (Quinta das Lameiras - Sº Pedro de Tomar). We have a small grocery store where you can find products from our farm and other farmers. Depending on the season we have vegetables, fruit, eggs, cottage cheese, olive oil and duck meat, lamb, chicken and turkey, rice, tuna, vinegar, etc. Being happy is the most important thing! Our backyard is the world! Love of João, Sara and Children

title: (2440) Batalha - Rue de Dom Douarte
description: This is the official 24-hour free RV park, approximately 200m from the Cathedral. Right next to the good pizzeria Old Jack. Closed on Mondays from 7 a.m. to 2 p.m. due to the market. VE 100m across the street.

title: (2440-038) Batalha - 14 Rua António Cândido da Encarnação
title_short: (2440-038) Batalha - 14 Rua António Cândido da Encarnação
description: Laundry. Self service 8h - 22h everyday.

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - 226 N243
description: Location at the edge of the road ideal for two camper because if no cars on top beautiful view, however noisy in the morning with cars that roll at high speed but repairs very well for one night.

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - LH Rua Francisco Serra Frazão
title_short: (2480) Porto de Mós - LH Rua Francisco Serra Frazão
description: Park next to Santa Casa da Misericórdia. Quieter than ASA, because ASA is next to the road. Parking and overnight stay allowed, except on fair days.

title: (2440) - 30 Estrada das Abronheiras
description: Parking near a sports complex with picnic tables. Very quiet place, a lot of place flat. We had an excellent night without any noise or passing. Not far from Bathala and the monastery but much more peaceful than the CC area in the center. No services.

title: (2410) Leiria - 2 Largo Doutor Sarmento
description: A big parking lot, just across the Intermarche and Burger King, free, motor home can park for the night, the electricity charging is just across the road

title: (2440) Batalha - Rua Nossa Senhora do Caminho
title_short: (2440) Batalha - Rua Nossa Senhora do Caminho
description: This site is the waste and water service area only, not overnight parking. There’s a charge for fresh water. The overnight parking area with electricity is close by, 100 metres away. 200 metres from the monastery, restaurants and cafes.

title: (2440) Batalha - 2440 Rua do Parque Cónego Manuel Simões Inácio
title_short: (2440) Batalha - 2440 Rua do Parque Cónego Manuel Simões Inácio
description: Let's pass a quiet night. We were two non-local parked motorhomes. A GNR passou, I fell with two motorhomes in no trouble. Passaram some times to go round, allowing pernoita. You have free Wi-Fi access.

address.street: 2440 Rua do Parque Cónego Manuel Simões Inácio

title: (2440) Batalha - 2 Rua das Piscinas
description: Electricity, 4 outlets available. For water, go to the other service area 200m further.

title: (2410-277) Leiria - 14 Rua Vitorino David
description: Quiet parking for one night.

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - 3 Largo do Rossio
title_short: (2480) Porto de Mós - 3 Largo do Rossio
description:
Free public toilets and showers including changing table. Very clean. Open from 9 a.m. to 7 p.m. Bad parking. It is best to use the parking lot on the opposite side of the park.
Not open on WEEKENDS!

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - Av. Dr. Licinio Moreira da Silva 2480
title_short: (2480) Porto de Mós - Av. Dr. Licinio Moreira da Silva 2480
description: Large pitches with water and possibility of draining gray and black water. Leisure park with picnic tables, miniature golf, ice rink and beautiful and spacious children's play areas. Next to a busy road during the day. There is clean spring water across the street. The facilities here are very good. With abuse, no electricity.

address.street: Av. Dr. Licinio Moreira da Silva 2480

title: (2440) Batalha - 1 Estrada da Saudade
description: Parking area not tested but discovered during our search for the night, we went elsewhere. circular track with flat and hard parking spaces. parking against the cemetery. the place looks peaceful and it is close to the monastery. Good troubleshooting in case of late arrival. To test !

title: (2480-303) Porto de Mós - Rua do Rio Alcaide
title_short: (2480-303) Porto de Mós - Rua do Rio Alcaide
description: Washing machines at the Intermarche parking lot

title: (2420) Gracios - Rua da Carvalha
description: Troncão Park. A quiet park with restrooms open during the day. Not for weekends as locals use it extensively for BBQ getaways. Can be noisy. Weekdays would be better.

title: (2440) Golpilheira - 75 Rua de Leiria
description: Beautiful laundry room with a drinking water fountain ideal for refilling and drinking…

title: (2480) São Bento - Rua Luís de Camões
title_short: (2480) São Bento - Rua Luís de Camões
description: Free parking area above the town with 6 individually laid out bays. Each bay is fully serviced with electricity, water and drainage (electricity and water not working on our visit probably because the aire has only recently opened, November 2019).Lovely area, very quiet.

title: (2400-221) Leiria - 123 Rua Capitao Mouzinho de Albuquerque
title_short: (2400-221) Leiria - 123 Rua Capitao Mouzinho de Albuquerque
description: Perfect parking to spend the night. We were feeling the other one that is close but there were people at 3:00. We came to this one that also has the shade of some magnificent branches. It has a walk next to the river and the city market.

title: (2400-137) Leiria - Unnamed road
description: Large parking lot for city visits, close to the center, free of charge

title: (2415-367) Leiria - 21 Rua Rossio dos Borges
description: Sandy parking near the river, a lot of foot traffic (therefore rather secure). Slightly sloping in some places. A few trees for shade. No problem even during the Feria.

title: (2260) Moita do Norte - 71 Rua Salgueiro Maia
title_short: (2260) Moita do Norte - 71 Rua Salgueiro Maia
description: Intermarche park, laundry machine with coin, could park day and night, gas station, park outside.

title: (2400-137) Leiria - Av. Bernardo Pimenta
description: Carpark across the road from the stadium, by the river. very quiet at night. cars start coming in around 8.30am during the week. close to loads of cafés across the river and short walk to restaurants. note that the carpark close to the stadium is used for a market (clothes, flowers, bags, etc..) on Tuesdays. recycling bins available

title: (2400) Leiria - Via do Polis Leiria
description: Nice park to visit city, it possible overnight, near castle and city center 10 min walking

title: () Leiria - Unnamed Road
description: The parking lot is flat, but there is a lot of noise at night due to traffic on the road next to it. There is a shopping mall across the street (Leiria shopping). No services

title: (2240) Ferreira do Zêzere - Avenida 13 de Junho
title_short: (2240) Ferreira do Zêzere - Avenida 13 de Junho
description: Intermarché car park where parking is permitted. This place is particularly practical for logistics (Food/fuel, Camping-Gas) but also for laundry since a self-service washing machine is available. The road adjoining the car park is quite busy but the nuisance is bearable. Optimal satellite and 4G reception.

title: (3105) Vermoil - 7 Rua Vale do Fôjo
description: Parking without services, quiet, a stone's throw from the town

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - 26 Rua Serra dos Candeiros
title_short: (2480) Porto de Mós - 26 Rua Serra dos Candeiros
description: Acesso através de terra Batida mas transitável, ótima vista e muito sossegado, tem 6 mesas pic nic e 2 barbecues.Sem água nem Wc.

title: (2400) Parceiros - 413 Rua de Santa Clara
description: A small LPG gas station where you can also feel empty German gas bottles. An adapter for German bottles is available. This can also be used to fill other bottles that you have connected to the German gas system with an adapter.

title: (2300) Tomar - 128B Bairro Hidroeléctrica do Zêzere
description: Quiet spot for a van or van short with a hold to level.

title: (2260-396) Vila Nova da Barquinha - 56C Rua Benvinda da Conceição Pereira
title_short: (2260-396) Vila Nova da Barquinha - 56C Rua Benvinda da Conceição Pereira
description:
Lavandaria
has TV, WiFi and gym equipment

title: (2240) Ferreira do Zêzere - 50 Rua Brigadeiro Lino Valente
title_short: (2240) Ferreira do Zêzere - 50 Rua Brigadeiro Lino Valente
description: Small Park for motorhomes.

title: (2415-408) Leiria - 2 Rua B
description: Laundry self service station

title: (2400) Leiria - 122 Rua Casal de Santa Clara
title_short: (2400) Leiria - 122 Rua Casal de Santa Clara
description: 2016.12.15 - parking cars along the street in a residential area surrounded by greenery on the hills of the city. A location would have been best at 100 meters roughly right in dead-end street, but I dared not disturb the car whose occupants seemed very busy in this somewhat dark area!

title: () Vila Nova da Barquinha - EM1190
description: Very quiet place at night, next to a beautiful park and by the river. Parking and cobblestone pavement, but no traffic at night. Free wifi working only during the day. Well-done and free service area.

title: (3250) Alvaiázere - Rua Doutor Filipe Antunes dos Santos
title_short: (3250) Alvaiázere - Rua Doutor Filipe Antunes dos Santos
description: Motorhome and caravan park municipal. Easy access to the town and local walks. 7e for motorhome, 3.80 per person. Clean facilities.

address.street: Rua Doutor Filipe Antunes dos Santos

name: Campground Castelo do Bode
title: (2200) Campground Castelo do Bode
description: Campsite Castello de Bode. Service area inside campground.

title: (2260) Vila Nova da Barquinha - 46 Rua da Barca
title_short: (2260) Vila Nova da Barquinha - 46 Rua da Barca
description: A calm place to Pic Nic and park camper van

title: (2415-408) Leiria - 2 Estrada da Estação
description: Illuminated and level parking lot directly at the train station. Suitable for mobile homes and vans up to around 6.50 m. Public toilets in the station open at the same time as the cafeteria. No trains at night. Garbage cans in the parking lot. Very quiet and safe area. Very tasty restaurants just around the corner (we went to Cervejaria João Gordo, great!).

name: Camping Lake Portugal
title: (2300) Camping Lake Portugal
description: Super nice campsite in the countryside by the lake. Quality restaurant with local products. Ideal for discovering Portuguese cuisine. Hospitality and impeccable services (and in French). Very good address!

title: (3100) Pombal -
description: Parking lot of a wedding party venue. Overnight stays are easily doable, especially during the week. The parking lot is flat and large. Please pay attention to cleanliness and leave no rubbish behind. There are no mobile home facilities here, but it is accessible at all times.

title: (2480) Calvaria de Cima - 11 Largo da Igreja
title_short: (2480) Calvaria de Cima - 11 Largo da Igreja
description: Water as if it was raining? (well almost) nice to fill the water bottle

title: (2300) - Unnamed Road
description: Parking very close to the water or for real off-roaders you can park by the water . very nice and calm. few People were enjoying the place on a weekend.

title: (2300) - 60 Estrada Barrinho
description:
Small sandy parking very particable. Just above the beach.
Very quiet at night.
The pleasure of the small evening at the water's edge and the morning splash.
Easy and accessible half-turn for all types of vehicles.

title: (2200) Martinchel - 427 Rua da Igreja
description: Small parking lot, near the supermarket and café restaurant. Beside the national route N358.

name: Casa Féteira
title: (2480-113) Casa Féteira
description:
Welcome you to our olive oil farm!

You can park your camping-car/van in our olive groove everyday of the week.

You can also ask for a guided tour of our olive mill in Portuguese, English or French, and understand how we make one of the bests olive oils of this region. From Mondays to Saturdays, between 9am and 6pm. 

You may want to order our homemade Portuguese meal and/or breakfast . 

You'll find our olive oil and other olive oil products on our shop and you'll be able to take home a piece of our portuguese culture!

We will be very happy to have you!

name: Quinta da Cerejeira
title: (2240-333) Quinta da Cerejeira
description: Quiet and peaceful campsite. toilet evacuation area and clean water supply, no discharge of dirty water but available in the village at 1.5km.

name: Campo de Futebol da Bezerra
title: (2480) Campo de Futebol da Bezerra
description: It is a place at the start of the Ecopista walk. There is a playground and a football field. It is outdated on the one hand, but the facilities for motorhomes seem very new. There are toilets but they are closed. There is also a place to bbq, but no idea if that can be used. Water works. Everything for free.

title: (2260) Tancos - 2 Avenida e Cais de Tancos
title_short: (2260) Tancos - 2 Avenida e Cais de Tancos
description: Before a parking restaurant near the river

title: (2260) Tancos - Avenida e Cais de Tancos
title_short: (2260) Tancos - Avenida e Cais de Tancos
description: Free park without facilities, nice view to the Castle. Near the Tejo river.

title: (2380) - CM1442
description: WC, picnic tables, view of the river, beautiful place!

title: (2380) Malhou - CM1442
description: Parking lot of the Praia Fluvial Olhos D'Agua in an olive grove. Shady and flat places available. You have to try something out. At Praia Fluvial, which is about 3 minutes from the parking lot, there are toilets, cold showers, trash cans, a bar / restaurant and tent camping next to the river bath. There are no facilities at the parking lot itself. A road leads past the parking lot and is also used at night. It can be noisy at the weekend, as the Praia is very busy in summer. Unfortunately there is rubbish everywhere.

name: Parque de Autocaravanas de Arripiado
title: (2140) Parque de Autocaravanas de Arripiado
description: Motorhome park, with gate, powee.Green space on the riverside in Arriado! Parking by the river very quiet

title: (2140) - 1 Rua Conde de Murça
description: Quiet area, tap water, grill, day park, cafes, next to the Tagus.

title: (2200) - Unnamed Road
description: Sweet spot. free parking for any sized camper. lake to swim in. perfect

title: (2260) Vilha Nova Da Barquinha - EM1191
description: Tarmac car park near a railway line (no traffic from 11 p.m. to 4 a.m.) Sadly daytime parking only…informed by GNR officers.

title: (3250) - N110
description: Picnic area with shades and tables and water

title: (2140) Praia do Ribatejo - N118
description: Panoramic view of the Almourol Castle. There are no support services available, but for a night you can stop for a rest.

title: (2240) Ferreira do Zêzere -
description: Chemin qui mène à un petit spot avec une vue à 360.  Attention ça grimpe sec, donc pas adapté à n’importe quel véhicule. Pleins d’autres chemins que nous n’avons pas exploré autour

title: (2415) Milagres - Est. Principal
description: Well shaded picnic area with several tables

title: (2480) Dinez - 47-51 Rua do Barreiro
description: I went there on the recommendation of another GPL gas station because I hadn't taken a tank adapter for my LPG tank bottle with me and I needed the right adapter for Portugal and Spain. All adapters were available there and even normal German gas bottles could be helped. In addition, the LPG price was also very cheap. So it was worth filling up there right away. Easy to reach from the IC-2, only the entrance to the gas station was a bit narrow. Turning with my 7.40 long camper was possible.

title: (2200) Abrantes -
description: Nice and quiet place to pass day and night

title: (2300) - Estrada dos Montes
description: Parking of the fluvial beach. Very calm.

title: (2250) - Unnamed Road
description: Parking to visit downtown Viva Science Astronomie. For Myores and children. We spent one night without a problem. Only there was wind. Superb view.

title: () Praia do Ribatejo - N3
description: Free parking and service point, worth a night or two. Lots of flat parking overlooking river & bridge. Pretty village 5 mins walk over the bridge with shops. Beware steep drive direct to bottom level, if you access by entering top level (left) first the next slope is much better.

title: (2150) Golegã - 43 Rua Timor Lorosae
description: Service terminal at the Intermarché da Golegã

name: Alma do Zêzere camping
title: (2250) Alma do Zêzere camping
description: Very nice camping near the river and in a typical village. Not expensive.

title: (2150) Golegã - Rua dos Castelões
description:
Grátis, calmo, tranquilo e seguro. Sem serviços. Bom para pernoita durante a feira da Golegã, embora concorrido. A 5 minutos a pé do centro da Cidade.

Free, quiet, quiet and safe. No services. Good for overnight stay during the fair of Golegã, although crowded. 5 minutes walk from the city center.

title: (2250-020) Constância - Avenida das Forças Armadas
description: Self service laundry which was installed in March 2019 at the entrance of the camp site. Three machines 18kg 8kg washers and 18kg drier. Cafe next door.

title: (2460) - IC2
description: Park for trucks, 24 hours dinner and serviço, with showers. in the gás station

title: (2240) Ferreira do Zêzere - CM1065
description: Miradouro do Castro, Ferreira do Zêzere

title: (2240) Dornes - EM521
description: Very quiet place to spend the night, overlooking Dornes, inside the locality it is very difficult to go since the streets are very narrow for larger camper vans.

title: (3100) Pombal - 3 Rua do Rio
description: Parking near a beautiful tree-lined playground for children. Public toilets available. A little further, picnic tables. Nice cycle and walking path nearby.

title: (2230) Souto -
description: Schöner Platz am See mit Badezugang. 2 Marmor Picknicktische. Gerader Stellplatz. Sehr steile Zufahrt bergab, für mutige Fahrer. Nicht für Wohnmobile.  NICHT größer als VW Bus. Achtet auf das Wetter. Regen—> rutschig

name: Câmara Municipal da Golegã - Município da Golegã
title: (2150-269) Câmara Municipal da Golegã - Município da Golegã
title_short: (2150-269) Câmara Municipal da Golegã - Município da Golegã
description: Municipal campsite of Golegã. Beautiful, quiet municipal campground in the village, near the Igreja. Space levels for many motorhomes. Bird watching. Large clean bathrooms, hot water, full services. The reception closes at 5:00 p.m. ⚠️

title: (2240-611) Dornes - Rua Rainha Santa Isabel
description: Beautiful place with amazing view over dornes town. Strong recommendation to walk fown on foot first as there is no turning around when cars are parked. its rather small and with a bit difficult access (narrow road). I wouldn't recommend it during summer months as its right next to the local lake beach and many cars park in this tight spot. would be ok overnight though. easy access to dornes town by bike 5min or by cannoe / sup 2min /walking 20min

title: (2240) - Unnamed Road
description: Nice location to spend the night in peace with beautiful view of the lake (10m). A large place for motorhome or campervan, 2 picnic tables, benches, water, trash.

title: (2240) - N348
description: Perfect to spend the day and sleep, very quiet. There are stairs that lead to a bathroom area.

title: (2240) Dornes - 10 Rua Nossa Senhora do Pranto
title_short: (2240) Dornes - 10 Rua Nossa Senhora do Pranto
description:
Uma vista lindíssima sobre o rio, vila de Dornes extremamente bonita e calma

A beautiful view over the river, village of Dornes extremely beautiful and calm. Town Wi-Fi. Small fountain close to the church or in the cemetery

title: (2240) - N348
description:
Small gravel car park with magnificent view of the lake. Some cars parked during the day. Quiet night, access to swimming. Single electricity plug inside a little warehouse free to use.
very nice view, access to the river, in the next beach there is a swimming pool.

title: (2240) - Unnamed Road
description: Superb isolated location surrounded by nature, next to a chapel (S. Pedro de Castro) Magnificent view of the lake. Calm assured. The access is through a secondary road, a bit difficult at its end. More suitable for 4x4.

title: (3100-456) Pombal - 58 Rua da Albergaria dos Doze
title_short: (3100-456) Pombal - 58 Rua da Albergaria dos Doze
description:
Free parking no facilities.

Location is across the tracks from the address listed.

Public Toilets at 300m near the Tennis Club.

title: (2000) - A1
description: Free park dedicated to Motorhomes or vancampers, low noise because of location far from A1.

title: (2405-009) Maceira - 2A Travessa da Shell
description: Shaded spot appropriate for overnight stay. Auto electrician across the road who will bring cars in and out of a morning and afternoon. Car park empties in afternoon. Next door to Service station and farms. Road is quiet of a nighttime.

title: (3100) Pombal - EM531
description: Nice and new picnic place in the middle of nature and adjacent to a "bioparque". Parking spaces, picnic tables and BBQ space are available. Toilets too.

title: (3260) - CM1146
description: Place with picnic tables just beside and with acess to a beautiful river beach. On summer and on weekends there’s locals visiting during weekdays it’s very calm and peaceful. It’s in the middle of the country and in the end of a mountain so will have a lot of curves on the road but nothing difficult.

title: (3100) Pombal - 44 Rua do Castelo
description: Nice, clean and quiet place in park uder the castle. Only toilet.

title: (3250) Leiria - 516 N110
description: Water fountain next to the main street. Space for one vehicle on the small forecourt. Good water flow, very large tube, therefore more suitable for canisters and/or watering cans. Large trash can next to it.

title: (2240) Dornes - Unnamed Road
description:
Excellent view, quiet place.
Only for 4x4.

title: (2150) Golegã -
description: Accessible by 4x4 or can be a small van because the path to access it is in very poor condition. Very calm, beautiful sunset over the Tagus, and the ballet of hunting fish

title: (6100) Palhais - Unnamed Road
description: Park near the road to Trizio beach. Nice view of the river. We spend the night here without any worries. For a maximum of one van

title: (3100-512) Pombal - 50 Rua José Farinha Portela Fernandes
title_short: (3100-512) Pombal - 50 Rua José Farinha Portela Fernandes
description: Intermarche supermarket gas station with a good price, it has the supermarket next door too.

title: (3100) Pombal - Unnamed Road
description: Ample parking. Near to the train station. From time to time a train passes but it is quite calm.

title: (2240-624) Ferreira do Zêzere -
description: A widening in a path through the forest along the water. From the road it is a walking route, but easily accessible with a 4x4. Campers and vans will be more difficult as it is again a steep climb back to the road

title: (2140) Vale de Junco - Unnamed Road
description: Nice flat picnic area with fireplace, tables and garbage can.

title: (6100) trizio - Unnamed Road
description: This is a great place to stay to be off the grid. Super cheap to stay, but no WiFi. Conditions are not great but they will do

title: (6110) Zaboeira - 1 Rua da Ladeira do Lombo
title_short: (6110) Zaboeira - 1 Rua da Ladeira do Lombo
description: Good place to spend the night. Quiet and illuminated. Good view of the river.

title: (2140) Ariolas - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place next to the river, ideal to spend a night.

title: (2400-801) Amor - 80 Rua da Fé
description: Picnic park very well equipped. Perfect to stop to eat and rest, or even sleep. There is no camping signage, but there is ample unrestricted parking. Quinchos with grills, covered oven, picnic tables, children's games, soccer field, exercise equipment, drinking water, bathrooms and showers. A beautiful and newly enabled place. Walking trails begin, a river passes and there is a swing. All very well taken care of. I was surprised to find it. Very long caravans will have to park a few meters further away, but they will still fit.

title: (2150) Golegã -
description: Nice place far enough from the bridge to sleep peacefully.

title: (3100-389) Pombal - 89 Rua Carlos Alberto de Mota Pinto
title_short: (3100-389) Pombal - 89 Rua Carlos Alberto de Mota Pinto
description: Good place to stay for 1/2 nights. Iluminated, with supermarket and gas station around. Very safe place. Local Police accept motorhome in this place with simpathy.

address.street: 89 Rua Carlos Alberto de Mota Pinto

title: (6100) Palhais -
description: Nice quiet place!

title: (2140) - Unnamed Road
description: A deserted road right on the river. Really beautiful spot. It's down a little side road

title: (2240) Vale Serrão - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place, better to reach with 4x4

title: (2430) Marinha Grande - 55 Rua de Francos
description: Parking of the Recreative club of the village. Parking is free and there is a public tap of water. If the club is open go for a coffee the community appreciates

title: (2480) - 13 Rua da Lagoa Grande
description: To spend a quiet night in the natural park, by a lake. There are very clean public toilets, tables, a barbecue, water.

title: (3240) Ansião - 7 Avenida Doutor Vítor Faveiro
description: Parque do Mercado…optimal to visit the whole area…sossegado…care for fairs and market days (Saturday)

title: (2000) Pernes -
description: Parking next to a school. A little movement to be next to a national road.

title: (2430-123) Marinha Grande - 66 Rua dos Poços
description: Herdade das Toupeiras offers this space where you can spend the night and day with your motorhome in total peace and rest. From here you can take the opportunity to get to know the city of Marinha Grande, which is the land of glass, as we are located less than 1 km from the city center. Namely, you can visit the Glass Museum and also the Joaquim Correia Museum, where you can also enjoy the beautiful gardens that exist in this city. Herdade das Toupeiras is also located about 10 km from the coast where we have several fantastic beaches to discover. At 100m from the Herdade there is a cafe and a laundry and we also have a bakery at about 300m and the supermarket is also close at about 700m. At Herdade das Toupeiras we have 12 places available, however the resources for motorhomes are still scarce and archaic, as the Herdade is not intended for profit. Soon it is expected to create an area for dumping and water supply. Donations are welcome for the proper maintenance and improvement of the space. As a campervan that I am, you can always count on me for anything! The Estate is open 24 hours but it is convenient to call to notify your arrival

title: (3240) Ansião - 2 Rua Manuel Melo
description: Park for small motorhomes

name: Miradouro de Fernandaires
title: (6100) Miradouro de Fernandaires
description: Spacious and quiet picnic area with an extended view point over Castelo do Bode dam arms. No amenities.
